name: GetUnsubscribedMemberInfo
description:
Retrieve info on an unsubscribed list member from a campaign.

Use this tool to get information about a specific list member who has unsubscribed from a campaign in Mailchimp.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: subscriber_email_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address for identification.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

parameters.name: include_fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to return, using a comma-separated list with dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
